icon_concept: I-C-integral formula fragment integrated into contour terrain
terrain_concept: Abstract basin topology with stability regions and mathematical annotations
header_prompt: Scientific illustration header in Notation-Cartographic Hybrid style. Left zone (200px): I-C-integral formula fragment rendered in Archive notation style, ink black (#1A202C) on subtle parchment. Center zone (800px): Series title 'Philosophy Series' in clean sans-serif, tagline below. Right zone (200px): Abstract basin terrain with contour lines in Terrain Blue (#2C5282) rising to Elevation Yellow (#ECC94B). Overall: publication-quality precision meets landscape exploration. Materials: Archive ink, compound blue, knocker-bug gold accents.

icon_concept: Three-Compassed rose without East direction marker
terrain_concept: Survey terrain with full elevation gradient and contour lines
header_prompt: Cartographic illustration header in Guild Practice style. Left zone (200px): Three-Compassed rose (N-S-W only, no East per W1 cosmology) in Survey Blue (#2C5282) with gold accents. Center zone (800px): Series title 'Spatial Series' in clean surveyor's hand style. Right zone (200px): Elevation terrain from Deep Blue through Yellow to Orange, contour lines at regular intervals. Overall: authentic survey map aesthetic. Materials: Survey-grade stock, compass rose stamp ink, elevation washes.

icon_concept: Specification text fragment or quill with ink
terrain_concept: Material swatches showing Dens-derived and Quarry pigments
header_prompt: Specification-style header honoring Kelleth Trove's method. Left zone (200px): Fragment of specification text in Archive hand, or quill with ink bottle. Center zone (800px): Series title 'Compiler's Eye' with tagline 'Visual Specification Through World-Building'. Right zone (200px): Material swatches showing Densmuck Black (#1A1A1A), Quarry Ochre (#B45309), Knocker-bug Gold (#CA8A04). Overall: the specification IS the aesthetic. Materials: Iron gall ink, quarry pigments, archive paper.

icon_concept: Flowing organic form suggesting growth and exploration
terrain_concept: Living mathematics curves with natural flow
header_prompt: Organic School header with flowing aesthetic. Left zone (200px): Abstract organic form in Forest Green (#276749) with Teal (#319795) accents, suggesting growth or exploration. Center zone (800px): 'Standalone Courses' title with flowing curves beneath. Right zone (200px): Living mathematics curves in Warm Amber (#D69E2E) suggesting dynamic processes. Overall: breathing mathematics, natural flow. Materials: Toadpipe bile green, greybeakeel teal, knocker-bug amber.

icon_concept: API brackets or model architecture icon
header_prompt: Commercial-Notation hybrid header bridging Densworld and modern ML. Left zone (200px): Stylized API brackets or model icon in Commercial Orange (#DD6B20). Center zone (800px): 'HuggingFace Series' in modern clean type. Right zone (200px): Technical notation elements with commercial accessibility - clean lines, approachable. Overall: professional, modern, accessible. Materials: Commercial inks, clean paper, modern aesthetic within Densworld palette.

icon_concept: CSQ notation elements or puzzle grid pattern
terrain_concept: Pattern recognition grid with precise geometry
header_prompt: Geometric School header with puzzle emphasis. Left zone (200px): CSQ notation symbol or abstract puzzle element in Slate (#1A202C). Center zone (800px): 'Puzzle Series' in precise geometric type. Right zone (200px): Pattern recognition grid with Deep Blue (#2B6CB0) elements, suggesting codes and formal systems. Overall: precision, pattern, structure. Materials: Iron gall ink, archive blue, clean geometric forms.

Geometric-Notation hybrid header with masters-level formality. Left zone (200px): Mathematical symbol cluster or stylized 'M' insignia in Slate (#1A202C). Center zone (800px): 'Masters Series' in formal academic type. Right zone (200px): Advanced mathematical notation fragments in Blue (#2B6CB0) and Green (#276749) per Notation Scribes convention. Overall: publication-ready, advanced, rigorous. Materials: Archive standard, formal notation, scholarly precision.

terrain_concept: Access paths rendered as terrain with API endpoints
header_prompt: Cartographic-Commercial hybrid header about access design. Left zone (200px): Gateway or threshold icon suggesting entry point, in Survey Blue (#2C5282). Center zone (800px): 'Access Architectures' in accessible modern type. Right zone (200px): Abstract terrain where paths represent API access routes, Commercial Orange (#DD6B20) for active paths. Overall: system architecture as explorable terrain. Materials: Survey stock, commercial inks, accessible aesthetic.
